## IJsonConverterOptions.extendVars property

Method used to extend variables for children of an array node during expansion. Default is to use a built-in extension function unless extendVars is explicitly set to undefined.

**Signature:**

```typescript
extendVars?: TemplateVarsExtendFunction;
```
